species.name: maschiff
descriptions: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.
Its well-developed jaw and fangs are strong enough to crunch through boulders, and its thick fat makes for an excellent defense.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
